name: Cursed - A Story of Pixel
description:
Cursed - A Story of Pixel

You wake up in a world corrupted by magic, infested with monsters.
Your goal, defeat the evil that devours the world.

Use your power to defeat ghouls, zombies and other horrors.

Controls

Left and Right Arrow to Move

Up Arrow to Jump

Bottom Arrow to Shoot

TAB to see the Map

0 to Interact

Credits

Clement Maubert Programming - Art

Adam Saltsman - Art
